item.title: How to Set Goals and Achieve them, According to Brian Tracy
item.description: Take a clean sheet of paper and write down Goals and today’s date. Write down 10 goals that you want to accomplish in the next 12 months ( write these goals in the present tense ) eg. I earn …, I achieve … Take this list of 10 and then you say, ‘If I had a magic wand and I could wave this magic wand and I could have any one goal on my list within 24 hours, which one goal would have the greatest positive impact on my life?
